answerText: If on a Winter's Night a Traveler [or Se una notte d'invierno un viaggiatore][10] If on a Winter's Night a Traveler was written by this Cuban-born Italian author, who wrote about long discussions between Marco Polo and Kublai Khan in Invisible Cities.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 3 | 9 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: At the end, you, the reader, exclaim "Just a moment, I've almost finished" this book. [10] Name this meta-novel centering on Ludmila and the reader, who discover that their copy of the book is corrupted. It is largely told in the second-person.
